name: Barvest: The Iconic Bug Harvest of 2005
name_original: Barvest: The Iconic Bug Harvest of 2005
description:
Eat all of the bugs to win in Barvest: The Iconic Bug Harvest of 2005!

How to eat a bug! Simply hold left click and run around it.

Note: There is a known camera bug that occurs when playing on Firefox. Please try another browser or the Windows version if you use Firefox!

Controls  Mouse & Keyboard
  • WASD: Movement
  • Mouse: Camera control
  • Left click: Shoot web at web-able object
  • Space: Jump
  • Space while off ground: Double jump
  • “R”: Reset to most recent checkpoint
  • “Escape” or “B”: Open book/pause
Controller
  • Left Stick: Movement
  • Right Stick: Camera
  • “B” or Right Trigger: Shoot web at web-able object
  • “A”: Jump
  • “A” while off ground: Double jump
  • Start: Open book/pause
  • Back: Reset to most recent checkpoint

Barvest: The Iconic Bug Harvest of 2005 is 3D Platformer where you play as a hungry spider on a quest to harvest as many nearby bugs as possible! Navigate across treacherous platforms and dangerous obstacles. Using your iconic web to grapple hanging points and wrap the enemies, you should be able to collect all of the nearby bugs. How quickly can you harvest them all?

The Environment  The Bugs

To harvest the bugs, you need to get in their range, fire a web at them, and then wrap around them once so that they can be consumed! You will run into some of these bugs:

Web Grapple Points

There are some points hanging in air that you can attach your web to, and then swing around on to reach new platforms! Look for these spots where the icon changes to being web-able and try jumping at them and shooting your web!

Other Level Elements

Cobwebs will speed you up as you walk on them

Puddles will slow you down as you walk on them

Trampolines will launch you in the air when you step on them

Spikes will kill you if you step on them

The Team 
  • Jaden Goter: Team Lead, Programming
  • Tessa Hardin: Art, UI, and Textures
  • Erik Skoog: Music, Programming
  • Jianfeng Sun: 3D Modelling, Animation
  • Camden Obertop: Programming, Level Design!
